extension.name: SEPA Direct Debit
extension.description: This extension provides SEPA Direct Debit processing.
extension.comments: WARNING: This is the DEVELOPER version of this extension. If you want a production stable version please use the official relases (https://github.com/Project60/org.project60.sepa/releases/latest). This module is the merge of Xaviers Dutoit's (xavier@tttp.eu) and Bj√∂rn Endres' (endres@systopia.de) Project60 branches. Special thanks to @scardinius for numerous contribtuions.
